GameData.LocalizedText:
Jian'an Style
+50% [ICON_Production] Production towards buildings in encampment, commercial hub and theatre. Each speciality district in destination city provides +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for domestic [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Routes. +10 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points when triggering an [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka or [ICON_CivicBoosted] Inspiration.
Cao Cao
An old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop a thousand li; an old man still aspires to make achievements.
Manipulative statesman, tactical commander, accomplished poet - Cao Cao, your talents cast a shadow that could make all those separatist warlords despair. Recruit able advisors and generals from all within the Four Seas, and lead your swift force to decimate your enemies when they spoke of your name in fear. There is only one way to bring peace to all under Heaven, and it must be walked alone.
Garrison Reclaimnaton
Cao Cao likes civilzation with high standing army and population, he hates civilzation with high standing but low population.
You have a great empire with strong army and high population.
The only thing you care about is the army, you should care about your citizens. ​
（You have a great empire with strong army and high population.)
（You have a empire with strong army but low population.）
Hubao Cavalry
Unique unit replacing Horseman when Cao Cao is leader of China, this unit has a higher Maintenance. +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting with wounded units.
Han Yong
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting with wounded units.
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when fighting with wounded units.
OK, let's unite.
No, you can't act with me.
Our cooperation now means a lot to both sides.
Wise move.
All right.
You challenge me? Hum...
Now, I'm your rival.
Next time I won't show mercy.
Next time I won't show mercy.
OK, I'll prepare a big meal.
No.
I sent a delegation to your capital to bring you gifts.
How dare you!
Why do you run counter to justice?[NEWLINE]（Condemn you）
I am Cao Cao, the leader of Hubao Cavalry. Where are you from?
Would you like to coem and have a taste of my cooking?
Oh, it looks like I have a good neighbor.
Good morning.
Alliance is good for both of us.
Armistice.
No way!
It's not good for both of us to keep fighting!
OK.
No way.
Can I go through your territory?
Your troops are too close to my territory!
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_CN_CAO_CAO_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_CN_CAO_CAO_ANY}
